items.title: Experience the Next Generation of Observability and Search Technology
items.desc: OpenObserve's innovative products include OpenObserve, a cutting-edge open-source observability platform designed for the cloud, kubernetes and bare metal alike that allows you to monitor your logs, metrics, and traces with ease. zPlane offers an enterprise version of OpenObserve for large businesses to meet their complex requirements. Both products offer exceptional cost savings and top-notch performance, enabling businesses to gain valuable insights into their systems' health and ultimately improve their software's quality.

jobs.title: Quality Assurance (QA)
jobs.description:
Role Summary:

We are seeking a seasoned Quality Assurance (QA) Specialist to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a firm understanding of both manual and automated testing, with specific expertise in using the Cypress testing framework. An understanding of performance testing using Locust would be a great plus. The successful candidate will be responsible for ensuring the high quality and optimal performance of our software products prior to release.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and execute detailed manual and automated test cases and scripts using Cypress.
  • Evaluate product functionality and create test strategies and test cases to assess product quality.
  • Identify, record, document thoroughly, and track bugs to resolution.
  • Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved.
  • Liaise with internal teams (e.g., developers and product managers) to identify system requirements and ensure consistent project execution.
  • Utilize Locust to perform performance testing and analyze results, identifying any performance issues and suggesting optimizations.
  • Develop, maintain, and continuously improve processes, systems, measurement practices, and metrics reporting for the QA function.
  • Work collaboratively within the team to promote innovative quality practices and methods.

Required Qualifications and Skills:

  • Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • Minimum of 3 years experience in software quality assurance, including both manual and automated testing.
  • Proficient with Cypress, with a clear understanding of how to create test cases and scripts.
  • Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify, analyze, and resolve issues creatively and independently.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Self-motivated with strong organizational skills and a keen attention to detail.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with performance testing, ideally using the Locust testing tool.
  • ISTQB certification or any other related software testing certifications.
  • Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process.


Location: Remote, Pune, India
